channel.title: Livestream on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Livestream on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Meta Is Debuting New Smart Glasses Today. Here’s How to Watch
item.description: Meta’s next face computers are set to be revealed at its Connect event on Wednesday evening. Some details may have already been leaked, but you can get the full rundown by tuning in live.

item.title: Meta Is Debuting New Smart Glasses Today. Here’s How to Watch
item.description: Meta’s next face computers are set to be revealed at its Connect event on Wednesday evening. Some details may have already been leaked, but you can get the full rundown by tuning in live.

item.title: A Misconfiguration That Haunts Corporate Streaming Platforms Could Expose Sensitive Data
item.description: A security researcher discovered that flawed API configurations are plaguing corporate livestreaming platforms, potentially exposing internal company meetings—and he’s releasing a tool to find them.
